This is another issue with data-initialized Config instances, as described in #7236 (http://bugzilla.qooxdoo.org/show_bug.cgi?id=7236).
The problem here is that the generator tries to absolutize "paths/app-root" (which, fwiw, in the Qooxdoo's base build files is set to a relative path), and that won't work if the config file is from memory and has no base path.
Since the app-root value is used to automatically calculate urls, it seems it should be legit to leave it off and instead specify all library urls manually.

It's important to note that this sort of depends on #6616 (http://bugzilla.qooxdoo.org/show_bug.cgi?id=6616), because without that ticket, it's not possible to provide a custom url for the __out__ library.
Pull request here:
https://github.com/qooxdoo/qooxdoo/pull/54
